common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: This is a new API which applicable for Cross Border (CB) sellers only to get the shop's payout data, will be used for the original API v2.get_payout_details replacement, we provide data such as the payout amount, currency, FX rate, the payout's associated order income and adjustment records etc.

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_item_under_btoc
error_list.description: There are B2C items that can't be added into your promotion

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: billing_transaction_info_type is required, format should be correct and input within 1-2

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid or missing cursor parameter. Please enter an empty string i.e. "" for the first request or use the next_cursor value returned from the previous response for subsequent requests.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The request body is not a valid json format

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: This payment API is only applicable for cross boarder shop

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid or missing page_size parameter , please enter a valid value that is with 1-100, indicating the number of records within a page.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: cursor is required and format should be correct. Please check

error_list.name: common.error_not_found
error_list.description: Unknown error: ***. Something wrong. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: page_size is required, format should be correct and input within 1-100

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: invalid time range, please ensure payout_time_to is greater than payout_time_from but within 15 days

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The selected payout start time is not supported. Please choose a start time no earlier than May 1, 2022.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Start time. Maximum time range is 15 days

","name":"payout_time_from","sample":"1643365068","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"wTPQmAS"},{"description":"

Payout End time

","name":"payout_time_to","sample":"1659003469","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"nzdPYYa"},{"description":"

Number of pages returned max:100

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int","required":"True","key":"eFkzHiM"},{"description":"

Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is \"\". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"cursor","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":"True","key":"SKJWJs"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kkWshxQ"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BBCwyRR"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"10fff653c945a390f8e1323c6bdffff4","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FbxhYky"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"WBdASjD","children":[{"description":"","name":"payout_list","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"iJEcxiR","children":[{"description":"

The settlement currency of orders.

","name":"from_currency","sample":"SGD","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fSnmhfF"},{"description":"

The actual currency of payout.

","name":"payout_currency","sample":"USD","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jEsCfhk"},{"description":"

The settlement amount.

","name":"from_amount","sample":"1769.01","type":"float","required":null,"key":"yKadhbT"},{"description":"

The actual amount of payout.

","name":"payout_amount","sample":"1769.01","type":"float","required":null,"key":"raTCWJG"},{"description":"

The exchange rate.

","name":"exchange_rate","sample":"\"1\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HJMZTtD"},{"description":"

The time of payout.

","name":"payout_time","sample":"1691050374","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"BZEfrEF"},{"description":"

The service provider of seller. Available value: payoneer, pingpong, lianlian.

","name":"pay_service","sample":"Payoneer","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RNSaHcN"},{"description":"

Seller's account to receive the payout.

","name":"payee_id","sample":"\"279016275538\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YEDtFk"},{"description":"

payout id used to query API \"v2.get_billing_item_info\" as request parameters. User can get detailed billing items under current payout

","name":"encrypted_payout_id","sample":"\"16061973102097436445\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RiXhQFB"}]},{"description":"

True or False

","name":"more","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"kznesKr"},{"description":"

used for next batch data query. will return empty when all data been returned

","name":"next_cursor","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KZEEZYM"}]}]}
